lead_paragraph: The Nordic countries will make a joint bid to host the European Championship in 2024 and 2028, with matches in Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Finland plus events in the Faroe Islands and Iceland, they announced on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Nordic Countries to Make Joint Bid for Euro 2024, 2028
headline.main: Nordic Countries to Make Joint Bid for Euro 2024, 2028

snippet: The Nordic countries will make a joint bid to host the European Championship in 2024 and 2028, with matches in Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Finland plus events in the Faroe Islands and Iceland, they announced on Sunday....
